metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Cabinet File Expansion
metadata.comment: Detects the expansion or decompression of cabinet files from potentially suspicious or uncommon locations, e.g. seen in Iranian MeteorExpress related attacks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\expand.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-f:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/f:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–f:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—f:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―f:'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\programdata')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\admin$\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\c$\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\favorites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\favourites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\contacts\\'))) AND NOT (lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\dell\\updateservice\\serviceshell.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\programdata\\dell\\updateservice\\temp\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the expansion or decompression of cabinet files from potentially suspicious or uncommon locations, e.g. seen in Iranian MeteorExpress related attacks

metadata.objective: False positive: System administrator Usage References: https://labs.sentinelone.com/meteorexpress-mysterious-wiper-paralyzes-iranian-trains-with-epic-troll, https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-intelligence/2021/08/new-variant-of-konni-malware-used-in-campaign-targetting-russia/
